title: [Question] Engineering Mathematics 1 questions
content:
How do I solve these questions? 
If someone has the link of notes/slides to these type of  convergence/divergence series questions please type in comments.

comments.body: it was not there for us.. as in out of syllabus
i js finished 2nd sem so yes.. why r u doing m1 though??
This is not there in syllabus, before you solve questions, check the syllabus of sem 1 in PESU Academy Under Syllabus
